name: Jesse Cook
description: '''Jesse Arnaud Cook''' (born November 28, 1964) is a Canadian guitarist. He is a [[Juno Award]] winner, ''[[Acoustic Guitar (magazine)|Acoustic Guitar]]'' Player's Choice Award silver winner in the Flamenco Category, and a three-time winner of the Canadian [[Smooth Jazz]] award for Guitarist of the Year. He has recorded on the [[EMI]], [[E1 Music]] and [[Narada Productions|Narada]] labels and has sold over 1.5 million records worldwide.
